decisions.label: Check for blank data

rules.name: Is_any_data_filled_from_ATP
rules.label: Is any data filled from ATP

decisions.description: check if there is a primary contact, then an email of completion will be sent
decisions.name: Check_for_completed_email_to_school_primary_contact
decisions.label: Check for completed email to school primary contact

decisions.description: check if there is a secondary contact, then an email of completion will be sent
decisions.name: Check_for_completed_email_to_school_secondary_contact
decisions.label: Check for completed email to school secondary contact

decisions.description: To trigger the subflow, checking whether: - there is data in the screen flow and there are no opp contact roles defined - the values have changed between the values in the screen and opp contact roles
decisions.name: Check_for_existing_contact
decisions.label: Check for existing details

rules.name: Are_contacts_changed
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5 AND 6) OR (7 AND 8 AND 9)
rules.label: Are contacts changed

decisions.description: Checking if rescheduling is needed or not
decisions.name: Check_for_rescheduling
decisions.label: Check for rescheduling

rules.name: Is_Responsible_Party_Other_IT_Provider_0
rules.label: Is Responsible Party = Other IT Provider

decisions.description: Check if the Engage with IT Provider can be marked as completed
decisions.name: Check_if_Engage_with_IT_Provider_task_is_completed
decisions.label: Check if Engage with IT Provider task is completed

rules.name: Engage_with_IT_Provider_is_completed
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4) AND ((5 AND 7) OR 6)
rules.label: Engage with IT Provider is completed

decisions.description: Checking different scenarios to verify if we can close the Gather Information task
decisions.name: Check_if_Gather_Information_task_is_complete
decisions.label: Check if Gather Information task is complete

rules.name: Task_complete_with_Responsible_Party_N4L
rules.label: Task complete with Responsible Party = N4L

rules.name: Task_complete_with_Responsible_Party_Large_Panel
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND (6 OR 7)
rules.label: Task complete with Responsible Party = Large Panel

rules.name: Task_complete_with_Responsible_Party_School_IT
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Task complete with Responsible Party = School IT

rules.name: Task_complete_with_Responsible_Party_Other_IT_Provider
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8
rules.label: Task complete with Responsible Party = Other IT Provider

decisions.name: Type_of_Task

Flow.description: Update first screen legend icons so they will display after enhanced domains activation

formulas.description: Formula for displaying the Completed Icon on the Icon Legend in the First Screen
formulas.name: completedIconImageDisplayFormula
ConfirmTTLReturnedToRecommendedValueDefault
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!varTextMigrationCompleteSubtasks}, "Confirm TTL Returned to recommended value"), True, False)

formulas.name: EngageWithITProviderFormula
formulas.expression: CASE({!varEngageWithITProviderTask.Status}, "Not Started", "", "Completed", "", "Not Required", "", "")

formulas.description: Formula for displaying the In Progress Icon in the Text Template for the Icon Legend
formulas.name: inProgressIconImageDisplayFormula

formulas.description: Check if the domain names value in the Gather Information screen is blank or not
formulas.name: ISBlankDomainNames

formulas.description: Check if the ICT Provider Company Name lookup field is blank or not
formulas.name: ISBlankICTProviderCompanyNameValue

formulas.description: Check if the primary contact value in the Gather Information screen is blank or not
formulas.name: ISBlankPrimaryContactValue

formulas.description: Check if the secondary contact value in the Gather Information screen is blank or not
formulas.name: ISBlankSecondaryContactValue

formulas.description: Check if the technical contact value in the Gather Information screen is blank or not
formulas.name: ISBlankTechnicalContactValue

formulas.description: Check if the tenancy type value in the Gather Information screen is blank or not
formulas.name: ISBlankTenancyType
MigrationCompleteSubstasksComplete
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!varTextMigrationCompleteSubtasks}, "Confirm TTL Returned to recommended value"), True, False)

formulas.description: formula for displaying the Not Started Icon in the Text Template for the Icon Legend
formulas.name: notStartedIconImageDisplayFormula
PurchaseOrderRequiredDefault
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!varTextEngageWithITProviderSubtasks}, "PO Required Yes"), "Yes", IF( CONTAINS({!varTextEngageWithITProviderSubtasks}, "PO Required No"), "No", ""))

formulas.name: SendInstructionManualDefault
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!varTextEngageWithITProviderSubtasks}, "Send Instruction Manual Email Yes"), "Yes", IF( CONTAINS({!varTextEngageWithITProviderSubtasks}, "Send Instruction Manual Email No"), "No", ""))

formulas.name: SendITProviderOverviewEmailDefault
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!varTextEngageWithITProviderSubtasks}, "Send IT Provider Overview Email Yes"), "Yes", IF( CONTAINS({!varTextEngageWithITProviderSubtasks}, "Send IT Provider Overview Email No"), "No", ""))

Flow.label: Email Protection - Main Flow

loops.description: Loop through all Installed N4L Product Feature Attributes to check and assign to record variables
loops.name: Loop_through_all_Installed_N4L_Product_Feature_Attributes
loops.label: Loop through all Installed N4L Product Feature Attributes

loops.description: Looping through all tasks under the EP Onboarding case
loops.name: Loop_through_all_tasks
loops.label: Loop through all tasks

loops.description: Looping through the non-empty Opportunity Contact role record collection
loops.name: Loop_through_OppContactRoles
loops.label: Loop through OppContactRoles

recordLookups.description: Retrieve the Agreement to Proceed Event for referencing it in a screen for user to have all data in one screen. In case there is no ATP, there's a fault path so the flow doesn't throw an error
recordLookups.name: ATPDetails
recordLookups.label: ATPDetails

value.stringValue: GetFeedback Survey Response: Email Protection ATP

screens.description:
Right side: Displays contacts and values from the ATP needed for the end user.
Left side: Contains the subtasks needed to complete and a comments box that's used in other tasks
screens.name: Email_Protection_Cutover_Task
screens.label: Email Protection Cutover Task

fields.name: EmailProtectionCutoverTitle
fields.fieldText: Task: Email Protection Cutover

fields.name: DisplayPrimaryContact2
fields.fieldText:
School Contact:

1. Primary Contact

{!PrimaryContactDetails.Name}

{!PrimaryContactDetails.Title}

{!PrimaryContactDetails.Email}

{!PrimaryContactDetails.Phone}

screens.description:
First Screen is for the user to select a task to work on. If no task is selected and the Next button is clicked, it will point back to this screen.
The formula in front of each task checks the status of the task and displays an icon (see legend on the right hand side of the screen) so the user knows which tasks are left to complete
screens.name: Email_Protection_First_Screen
screens.label: Email Protection First Screen

fields.name: IconLegend
fields.fieldText:
Icon Legend:

{!completedIconImageDisplayFormula} = Task Completed or Not Required

{!inProgressIconImageDisplayFormula} = Task In Progress

{!notStartedIconImageDisplayFormula} = Task Not Started

screens.description:
Right side: Display the details needed for the SDS to contact the IT Provider
Left side: Gather Data based on the answer of the Provider. Data will be saved under Activity/Subtasks (multi-select picklist). If Purchase Order Required = Yes, then a contract needs to be active. This is outside the flow.
screens.name: Engage_with_IT_Provider_Task
screens.label: Engage with IT Provider Task

fields.name: EngageWithITProviderTitle
fields.fieldText: Task: Engage with IT Provider

fields.name: ErrorForMissingContract
fields.fieldText: There is no contract with the IT Provider. Please add a contract before continuing

fields.name: EngageWithITProviderTextForUser
fields.fieldText:
ICT Implementation Provider: {!CaseDetails.ICT_Implementation_Provider__r.Name}

Name: {!TechnicalContactDetails.Name}

Email address: {!varTechnicalContactRole.Contact.Email}

Phone: {!varTechnicalContactRole.Contact.Phone}

screens.description: This screen displays the ATP (right hand side) and gives the user the possibility to data entry (left hand side). All fields have a default value (except IT Provider Company Name).
screens.name: Gather_Information_Task
screens.label: Gather Information Task

fields.name: GatherInformationTitle
fields.fieldText: Task: Gather Information

fields.name: Responsible_Party
fields.helpText: Select who will be responsible for the migration

value.stringValue: Paste here the Technical Contact Email Address from ATP
Paste here the Primary Contact Email Address from ATP
Paste here the Secondary Contact Email Address from ATP

fields.name: Domain_Names
fields.helpText: Please add a semicolon (;) and a space ( ) between domain names
